description: A Waterway is a transportation space used for the movement of vessels upon or within a water body.

properties.name: class
properties.description: Indicates the specific type of the Waterway.

properties.name: function
properties.description: Specifies the intended purposes of the Waterway.

properties.name: usage
properties.description: Specifies the actual uses of the Waterway.

properties.name: section
properties.description: Relates to the sections that are part of the Waterway.

properties.name: intersection
properties.description: Relates to the intersections that are part of the Waterway.
